body_html: In PyTorch, there is a context-manager which can be used to change the default device options, e.g., changing everything from float to double. Do you plan to eventually support this? If so, with the design as written here you are committing to the fact that these values get read at DeviceOption construction time (since these are direct things, not optional)

body: In PyTorch, there is a context-manager which can be used to change the default device options, e.g., changing everything from float to double. Do you plan to eventually support this? If so, with the design as written here you are committing to the fact that these values get read at DeviceOption construction time (since these are direct things, not optional)
